data.name: Tiger Knight Empire War - Rome Macrinus Pack
data.detailed_description:
Macrinus DLC pack includes the following content:

New adjutant---Marcus Nonius Macrinus. He has the skill that can increase troop’s defense and movement speed.
Roman General Armor——advanced Roman-style general armor meticulously manufactured by Roman craftsmen. This luxuriously decorated and exquisitely designed armor is a symbol of nobility and glory and can only be used by the emperor’s close advisors.
data.about_the_game:
Macrinus DLC pack includes the following content:

New adjutant---Marcus Nonius Macrinus. He has the skill that can increase troop’s defense and movement speed.
Roman General Armor——advanced Roman-style general armor meticulously manufactured by Roman craftsmen. This luxuriously decorated and exquisitely designed armor is a symbol of nobility and glory and can only be used by the emperor’s close advisors.
data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 32bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual core or equipment
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx9 compliant graphics card with 1024MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 64bit
  • Processor: 3.7 GHz 4 core or equipment
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx11 compliant graphics card with 2048MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
